activity_long: At home activity, not working (for pay) or schooling
Working (for pay) at work or home
Other work-related activity (meeting, visit, sale call, etc.)
Routine shopping (grocery, get gas, clothing, convenience store, household maintenance, etc.)
Shopping for major purchase/specialty item (appliance, electronics, new vehicle, major household repairs, etc.)
Dining out/take-out/coffee (eat at restaurant, get take-out/fast-food)
Change type of transportation/Transfer to (take bus, airplane, park car or pick up parked car if walk 2+ blocks, etc.)
Household errands (bank/ATM, post office, dry cleaning, car services, etc.)
Personal business (visit government office, attorney, accountant, etc.)
Recreation/entertainment (walk the dog, exercise/workout, go to a movie)
